messages.content: What is the primary function of the ComfyUI-Translator custom node?
The primary function of the ComchyUI-Translator custom node is to translate any language into English based on the input prompt, utilizing the googletrans library.
What library is used by the ComfyUI-Translator custom node for translation?
The ComfyUI-Translator custom node makes use of the googletrans library for translation tasks.
